Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Chionodracine (cnd, piscidin-like, natural AMPs; fish, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 5-20 uM), B. cereus (MIC 5-10 uM), and Psychrobacter sp.(MIC 10-15 uM). The MIC values of the former two are sensitive to temperature.MOA:bacteria:E. coli: it permeabilized the memrbanes.Structure:  In complex with DPC, residues 4-20 of the peptide are helical (Olivieri C et al., 2015).In vitro toxicity: human RBC: 1% hemolysis at 50 uM.
Literature Information.Author: Buonocore F, Randelli E, Casani D, Picchietti S, Belardinelli MC, de Pascale D, De Santi C, Scapigliati G.2012
Literature Information.Title: A piscidin-like antimicrobial peptide from the icefish Chionodraco hamatus (Perciformes: Channichthyidae): molecular characterization, localization and bactericidal activity
